content: i have used 100% cotton - maxi 565meters on 100gr because you do have quetions about picture here is start of the crocheting you start in the middle of circle with 10 chains 2 row 16 single_crochet 3 row 3ch instead first double_crochet 5ch double_crochet repeat * * 15x - in row you have 16 5ch loops 4 row slip_stitch in middle of first loop 5chains… … this is start… i think you would be able now manage it… get it in pattern there are only double_crochet single_crochet and chains… hope it will help petra
